sage.physics.ODE4J

Class ODE4JPhysicsObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.physics.ODE4J.ODE4JPhysicsObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPhysicsObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ODE4JBoxObject, ODE4JCapsuleObject, ODE4JCapsuleXObject, ODE4JCapsuleZObject, ODE4JCylinderObject, ODE4JCylinderXObject, ODE4JCylinderZObject, ODE4JSphereObject, ODE4JStaticPlaneObject

    public abstract class ODE4JPhysicsObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPhysicsObject
    A superclass for all of the ODE4J physics objects.
    Author:
    Kyle

      • setSleepThresholds

        public void setSleepThresholds(float linearThreshold,
                               float angularThreshold)
        Description copied from interface: IPhysicsObject
        Sets the sleep threshold for this physics object. The sleep threshold determines at what velocity an object is determined to have come to rest and thus is no longer updated by the physics engine until another object or force affects the object. This can slightly improve performance and help with object having a slight vibrating effect when they should come to rest.
        Specified by:
        setSleepThresholds in interface IPhysicsObject

      • getLinearSleepThreshold

        public float getLinearSleepThreshold()
        Description copied from interface: IPhysicsObject
        Returns the linear sleep threshold.
        Specified by:
        getLinearSleepThreshold in interface IPhysicsObject
        Returns:
        the linear sleep threshold for this object

        Description copied from interface: IPhysicsObject
